original_text: Seeing it is hid from the eyes of all living, and kept close from the fowls of the air.
korean_text: 모든 생물의 눈에 숨겨졌고 공중의 새에게 가려졌으며

sentences.original_text: Seeing it is hid from the eyes of all living
sentences.korean_translation: 살아 있는 모든 자의 눈에서 숨겨져 있음을 보니

sentences.original_text: and kept close from the fowls of the air
